content: I think I need to take a step back and focus on what I really want to achieve in my career. I've been feeling pressure to climb the corporate ladder, but now I'm wondering if that's really what I want. I've always been interested in writing and storytelling, but I never thought it could be a viable career path. Maybe it's time for me to explore that further. Do you have any resources or advice on how to get started with writing as a career?
